title: Perry's at it again; dunks over LBC teammate
text:
Perry's at it again; dunks over LBC teammate 
Updated: 
Posted by: Jason Bristol 
HARRISBURG - He may never top his most famous dunk, but a student-athlete at Lancaster Bible College still rises to the occasion. 
Dondre 'Dre' Perry dunked over a teammate sitting on a bike on Wednesday night during the school's annual Midnight Madness event. 
Last year, Perry dunked over the school president, a story later documented by CBS 21 News. 
Read More at: http://www.local21news.com/sports/features/local-sports/stories/Powerful-dunk-LBC-President-player-rise-to-occasion-136651.shtml 
What happened at Lancaster Bible College shows the true meaning of higher education. It's a slam dunk that didn't even count -- at least not on the scoreboard. Related Stories Business News 
Applications for US unemployment aid drop to 42-year low 
WASHINGTON (AP) -- The number of Americans seeking unemployment aid fell last week, matching the lowest level in 42 years, strong evidence that employers remain confident enough in the economy to hold onto their staffs.
